snippet.title: Forced Showdown Drone Invasion Expansion Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available from July 31st - 2016
Get it on steam: 
Drone Invasion (DLC) - http://store.steampowered.com/app/492750/
Forced Showdown - http://store.steampowered.com/app/265000/

Action and deckbuilding are combined in a Galactic Game Show - but questions are replaced by deadly Gladiator Battles! 
You are the contestant - will you die or become a crowd favorite?
